item.title: Miele Professional PG 85 Series
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a path traversal vulnerability in Miele Professional’s PG 85 product series.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Schneider Electric Wonderware InduSoft Web Studio
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an incorrect default permissions vulnerability in Schneider Electric’s Wonderware InduSoft Web Studio.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Detcon SiteWatch Gateway
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for authentication bypass and plaintext storage of a password vulnerabilities in Detcon’s SiteWatch Gateway.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Schneider Electric SoMachine HVAC
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for buffer overflow and DLL hijack vulnerabilities in Schneider Electric’s SoMachine HVAC.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Hanwha Techwin SRN-4000
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an unauthenticated access vulnerability in Hanwha Techwin’s SRN-4000.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Schneider Electric VAMPSET
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a memory corruption vulnerability in Schneider Electric’s VAMPSET.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Phoenix Contact GmbH mGuard
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for resource exhaustion and improper authentication vulnerabilities in Phoenix Contact GmbH’s mGuard network device.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Satel Iberia SenNet Data Logger and Electricity Meters
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a command injection vulnerability in Satel Iberia’s SenNet Data Logger and Electricity Meters.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Siemens devices using the PROFINET Discovery and Configuration Protocol
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a denial of service vulnerability in Siemens devices using the PROFINET Discovery and Configuration Protocol.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Siemens devices using the PROFINET Discovery and Configuration Protocol
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for denial of service vulnerabilities in Siemens devices using the PROFINET Discovery and Configuration Protocol.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Siemens SIMATIC WinCC and SIMATIC WinCC Runtime Professional
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a denial of service vulnerability in the Siemens SIMATIC WinCC and SIMATIC WinCC Runtime Professional.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Rockwell Automation Stratix 5900
item.description: This advisory was originally posted to the NCCIC Portal on April 4, 2017, and is being released to the NCCIC/ICS-CERT web site. This advisory contains mitigation details for improper input validation, resource management errors, improper authentication, and path traversal vulnerabilities in Rockwell Automation’s Stratix 5900.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Hikvision Cameras
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for use of improper authentication and password in configuration file vulnerabilities in Hikvision’s cameras.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Dahua Technology Co., Ltd Digital Video Recorders and IP Cameras
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for use of password hash instead of password for authentication and password in configuration file vulnerabilities in Dahua Technology Co., Ltd digital video recorders and IP cameras.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Advantech WebAccess
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an absolute path traversal vulnerability in Advantech’s WebAccess.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Rockwell Automation ControlLogix 5580 and CompactLogix 5380
item.description: This advisory was originally posted to the NCCIC Portal on April 4, 2017, and is being released to the NCCIC/ICS-CERT web site. This advisory contains mitigation details for a resource exhaustion vulnerability in Rockwell Automation's ControlLogix 5580 and CompactLogix 5380.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Schneider Electric Wonderware Historian Client
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for an improper XML parser configuration vulnerability in Schneider Electric’s Wonderware Historian Client.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: CyberVision Kaa IoT Platform
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a code injection vulnerability in CyberVision’s Kaa IoT Platform.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Advantech B+B SmartWorx MESR901
item.description: This advisory contains mitigation details for a use of client-side authentication vulnerability in the Advantech B+B SmartWorx MESR901 Modbus gateway.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: GE Multilin SR, UR, and URplus Protective Relays (Update A)
item.description: This updated advisory is a follow-up to the original advisory titled ICSA-17-117-01 GE Multilin SR Protective Relays that was published April 27, 2017, on the NCCIC/ICS-CERT web site. This updated advisory contains mitigation details for a weak cryptography for passwords vulnerability in GE's Multilin SR protective relays.
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document
